alert.note: Alert for Kemper; Lauderdale; Newton (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 09 at 8:07PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN NEWTON... SOUTHWESTERN KEMPER AND NORTHWESTERN LAUDERDALE COUNTIES THROUGH 830 PM CST... At 807 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Martin, or 12 miles east of Union, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Collinsville, Martin, Damascus, and Prismatic around 810 PM CST. Liberty around 815 PM CST. Daleville around 820 PM CST. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CST for east central Mississippi.
